title: Connection Status: get started quickly
text: [To start using the asset, start by importing the DTT.Networking.ConnectionStatus namespace into your script file.][You can now start referencing the ConnectionStatusManager class and get target info. Want to edit your default target settings or add a new custom one? You can do that by opening the window using Tools > DTT > Connection Status > Window.][This will open the connection status window:][i][Want to dive deeper? Take a look at our documentation:][l]
